research_sessions.technology: Microsoft Access Database Migration to PostgreSQL
research_sessions.summary: Comprehensive guide for reading Microsoft Access .accdb files in Python 3.11+, extracting table schemas, handling BLOB/OLE Object fields (especially images), and migrating data to PostgreSQL. Covers pyodbc, pypyodbc, pandas, pywin32 libraries, Docker container considerations, and complete migration examples with image extraction.
topics: Table schema extraction and data migration
OLE Object field handling and image extraction
